alert_levels.Level 0: Safe — swimming or floating detected. No action.
alert_levels.Level 1: Drowning detected at >= 40% confidence. Audio beep plays. 2-second confirmation then 5-second escalation timer starts.
alert_levels.Level 2: EMERGENCY — drowning sustained for 5 seconds post-confirmation. Audio alarm plays once. Telegram alert dispatched. 20s response countdown then auto-reset.
